pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a really basic metapackage to pull in some stuff which Gentoo doesn't include by default but is generally considered standard on almost every other big distribution of Linux (and most other UNIX derivatives). This adds on to virtual/basic-system-meta by pulling in linux-firmware, pm-utils, and a network time daemon (net-misc/ntp by default), all of which are standard on most other distros, but only really make sense on physical hardware.
